entry.title: First Post
entry.summary:
Time Series in Python and Pandas¶

Data observations occurring over different points in time, whether fixed frequency or irregular.¶

Entities useful to think about concerning time series¶

Timestamps - specific instants in time

Intervals - spans of time marked by a starting and ending timestamp

Periods - special cases of Intervals, neatly bookended, like the month of January, the 1st Quarter, or the year 2016

.prompt {
  /* This needs to be wide enough for 3 digit prompt numbers: In[100]: */

.CodeMirror {

}
.CodeMirror-lines {
  /* In CM2, this used to be 0.4em, but in CM3 it went to 4px. We need the em value because */

  border: 0;

div.output_wrapper {
  /* this position must be relative to enable descendents to be absolute within it */

  -moz-box-orient: vertical;

}
/* class for the output area when it should be height-limited */
div.output_scroll {
  /* ideally, this would be max-height, but FF barfs all over that */
  height: 24em;
  /* FF needs this *and the wrapper* to specify full width, or it will shrinkwrap */
  width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  border-radius: 2px;
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);

}

div.output_collapsed {

div.out_prompt_overlay:hover {

}

.output {

div.output_area pre {

/* This class is for the output subarea inside the output_area and after

div.output_subarea {
  overflow-x: auto;

}
div.output_scroll div.output_subarea {

}
/* The rest of the output_* classes are for special styling of the different
   output types */
/* all text output has this class: */
div.output_text {

  /* This has to match that of the the CodeMirror class line-height below */
  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* stdout/stderr are 'text' as well as 'stream', but execute_result/error are *not* streams */
div.output_stderr {

}
div.output_latex {

}
/* Empty output_javascript divs should have no height */

/* raw_input styles */
div.raw_input_container {

input.raw_input {
  font-family: monospace;
  font-size: inherit;
  color: inherit;
  width: auto;
  /* make sure input baseline aligns with prompt */
  vertical-align: baseline;

  margin: 0em 0.25em;
}
input.raw_input:focus {

.highlight  { background: #f8f8f8; }

.highlight .k { color: #008000; font-weight: bold } /* Keyword */
.highlight .o { color: #666666 } /* Operator */

.highlight .cs { color: #408080; font-style: italic } /* Comment.Special */

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h1 id="Time-Series-in-Python-and-Pandas">Time Series in Python and Pandas<a class="anchor-link" href="#Time-Series-in-Python-and-Pandas">¶</a></h1>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Data-observations-occurring-over-different-points-in-time,-whether-fixed-frequency-or-irregular.">Data observations occurring over different points in time, whether <em>fixed frequency</em> or <em>irregular</em>.<a class="anchor-link" href="#Data-observations-occurring-over-different-points-in-time,-whether-fixed-frequency-or-irregular.">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Entities-useful-to-think-about-concerning-time-series">Entities useful to think about concerning time series<a class="anchor-link" href="#Entities-useful-to-think-about-concerning-time-series">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Timestamps - specific instants in time</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Intervals - spans of time marked by a starting and ending timestamp</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Periods - special cases of Intervals, neatly bookended, like the month of January, the 1st Quarter, or the year 2016</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Experiment or Elapsed time - time relative to an arbitrarily chosen $t_0$ starting timestamp.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Standard-Python-Date-and-Time-Data-Types">Standard Python Date and Time Data Types<a class="anchor-link" href="#Standard-Python-Date-and-Time-Data-Types">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Python has date and time functionality in its <code>datetime</code>, <code>time</code>, and <code>calendar</code> modules.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The most basic type is the <code>datetime</code> type from the <code>datetime</code> module, which can store a date and time down to the microsecond</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">datetime</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">datetime</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="the-datetime-type---a-timestamp">the <code>datetime</code> type - a timestamp<a class="anchor-link" href="#the-datetime-type---a-timestamp">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The <code>now()</code> method returns current time and will also take a time zone argument</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">now</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">now</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">now</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[3]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(2017, 11, 12, 11, 7, 30, 155385)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [4]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="nb">type</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">now</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[4]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The <code>today()</code> method also returns the current time but does not take any arguments.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">today</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">today</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">today</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[5]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(2017, 11, 12, 11, 8, 2, 482550)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="nb">type</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">today</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[6]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Both give precision down to the microsecond.<br />
0.001 = 1 millisecond = one onethousandth of a second<br />
0.000001 = 1 microsecond = one onemillionth of a second<br />
0.0000000001 = 1 nanosecond = one onebilliong of a second</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="the-date-type---less-precision-than-the-datetime-type">the <code>date</code> type - less precision than the <code>datetime</code> type<a class="anchor-link" href="#the-date-type---less-precision-than-the-datetime-type">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [9]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">my_time</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">now</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>.date()</code> returns a <code>date</code> object without a time.<br />
Requires a <code>datetime</code> object, not integer arguments.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Two ways to do it:</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [11]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">my_time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">date</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[11]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.date(2017, 11, 12)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [36]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">date</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">my_time</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[36]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.date(2017, 11, 12)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [14]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">my_date</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">my_time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">date</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="nb">type</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">my_date</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[14]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.date</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Extracting-pieces-of-a-datetime-object">Extracting pieces of a <code>datetime</code> object<a class="anchor-link" href="#Extracting-pieces-of-a-datetime-object">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [46]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">my_time</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">now</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">my_time</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[46]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(2017, 11, 12, 7, 16, 48, 466682)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>.year</code>, <code>.month</code>, <code>.day</code>, <code>.hour</code>, <code>.minute</code>, <code>.second</code>, <code>.microsecond</code><br />
<code>.weekday()</code> returns the day of the week on a Mon=0, ..., Sun=6 scale</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [62]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">my_time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">month</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[62]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>11</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [61]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">my_time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">microsecond</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[61]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>466682</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [64]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">my_time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">weekday</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[64]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>6</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="use-datetime()-to-manually-create-a-datetime-object">use <code>datetime()</code> to manually create a datetime object<a class="anchor-link" href="#use-datetime()-to-manually-create-a-datetime-object">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [7]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">new_time</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2017</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">31</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">23</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">45</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">23</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">234456</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">new_time</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[7]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(2017, 10, 31, 23, 45, 23, 234456)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="the-timedelta-type---an-Interval---the-difference-in-time-between-two-timestamps">the <code>timedelta</code> type - an Interval - the difference in time between two timestamps<a class="anchor-link" href="#the-timedelta-type---an-Interval---the-difference-in-time-between-two-timestamps">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>When a <code>datetime</code> object is subtracted from another, a <code>timedelta</code> object results.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [79]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">diff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">my_time</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">new_time</span>
<span class="n">diff</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[79]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.timedelta(11, 27085, 232226)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>the difference is expressed in days, seconds, microseconds</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [80]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="nb">type</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">diff</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[80]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.timedelta</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Can also have <code>timedelta</code> expressed only in seconds with <code>.total_seconds()</code></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [83]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">diff</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">total_seconds</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[83]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>977485.232226</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Can also extract pieces from a <code>timedelta</code> object.<br />
<code>.days</code>, <code>.seconds</code>, <code>.microseconds</code></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [89]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">diff</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">days</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[89]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>11</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Cannot subtract a <code>date</code> object from a <code>datetime</code> object or vice versa.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [103]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">my_time</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">my_date</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_text output_error">
<pre>
<span class="ansi-red-fg">---------------------------------------------------------------------------</span>
<span class="ansi-red-fg">TypeError</span>                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<span class="ansi-green-fg"><ipython-input-103-b86ac857467e></span> in <span class="ansi-cyan-fg"><module></span><span class="ansi-blue-fg">()</span>
<span class="ansi-green-fg">----> 1</span><span class="ansi-red-fg"> </span>my_time <span class="ansi-blue-fg">-</span> my_date

<span class="ansi-red-fg">TypeError</span>: unsupported operand type(s) for -: 'datetime.datetime' and 'datetime.date'</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>But can subtract one <code>date</code> object from another, resulting in a <code>timedelta</code> object of days.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [16]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">new_date</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">new_time</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">date</span><span class="p">()</span>  <span class="c1"># make a new date object</span>
<span class="n">new_date</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[16]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.date(2017, 10, 31)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [21]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">test</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">my_date</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">new_date</span>  <span class="c1"># difference results in timedelta object</span>
<span class="n">test</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">resolution</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[21]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.timedelta(0, 0, 1)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Manually-create-intervals-with-the-timedelta()-method.">Manually create intervals with the <code>timedelta()</code> method.<a class="anchor-link" href="#Manually-create-intervals-with-the-timedelta()-method.">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [23]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">datetime</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">timedelta</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [29]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">my_interval</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">timedelta</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">3600</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">37</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="mi">60</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">22</span><span class="p">)</span>  <span class="c1"># 12 days 5hrs 37 min 22 seconds</span>
<span class="n">my_interval</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[29]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.timedelta(20, 20242)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Shift-time-with-timedelta()">Shift time with <code>timedelta()</code><a class="anchor-link" href="#Shift-time-with-timedelta()">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>timedelta</code> objects can be added or subtracted from <code>datetime</code> or <code>date</code> objects, resulting in the same type shifted forward or backward in time.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [26]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">start</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2017</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [37]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">start</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">timedelta</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[37]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(2017, 6, 19, 0, 0)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [30]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">start</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">my_interval</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[30]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(2017, 7, 21, 5, 37, 22)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [35]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="nb">type</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">my_date</span><span class="p">)</span>  <span class="c1"># try a timedelta with a date type</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[35]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.date</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [39]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">my_date</span>  <span class="c1"># reminder</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[39]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.date(2017, 11, 12)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [38]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">my_date</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">timedelta</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">657</span><span class="p">)</span>  <span class="c1"># results in a date type, seconds and microseconds are lost in the process</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[38]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.date(2017, 11, 15)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Can work with multiples of timedeltas as well.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [40]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">four_weeks_hence</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">now</span><span class="p">()</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">4</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">timedelta</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">four_weeks_hence</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[40]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(2017, 12, 10, 11, 51, 20, 216229)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Datetimes-and-strings">Datetimes and strings<a class="anchor-link" href="#Datetimes-and-strings">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Converting-datetimes-to-string">Converting datetimes to string<a class="anchor-link" href="#Converting-datetimes-to-string">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [42]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">stamp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2017</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">11</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">14</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">37</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">33</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">stamp</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[42]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'2017-11-12 14:37:33'</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Convenient function but maybe not the desired format or more than you want.<br />
For a little control, use <code>strftime()</code>, mnemonic "string format time".<br />
It takes a <code>datetime</code> and a formatting string argument.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [47]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">strftime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">stamp</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'%m-</span><span class="si">%d</span><span class="s1">-%y'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[47]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'11-12-17'</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Can achieve many different results using the formatting codes.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [49]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">strftime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">stamp</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'%A, the </span><span class="si">%d</span><span class="s1">th of %B, %Y'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[49]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>'Sunday, the 12th of November, 2017'</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>See full formatting codes at Python docs <a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#strftime-and-strptime-behavior">https://docs.python.org/3/library/datetime.html#strftime-and-strptime-behavior</a></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Converting-strings-to-datetimes">Converting strings to datetimes<a class="anchor-link" href="#Converting-strings-to-datetimes">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Very often you will encounter a date represented as a string and need to convert it to <code>datetime</code> in order to perform calculations.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="strptime()"><code>strptime()</code><a class="anchor-link" href="#strptime()">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>strftime()</code> sister function, <code>strptime()</code> takes a string date and a formatting string indicating the positions of the date components in the string date and returns a <code>datetime</code> object.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [50]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">strptime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'3/14/17'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'%m/</span><span class="si">%d</span><span class="s1">/%y'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[50]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(2017, 3, 14, 0, 0)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [51]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">datetime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">strptime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Dec-12-2017'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'%b-</span><span class="si">%d</span><span class="s1">-%Y'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[51]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(2017, 12, 12, 0, 0)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>This works well, but you may get weary of always having to supply the formatting string.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="parse()"><code>parse()</code><a class="anchor-link" href="#parse()">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The <code>dateutil</code> package contains a powerful function, <code>parser.parse()</code> which will parse most date strings into a <code>datetime</code>.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [52]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">dateutil.parser</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">parse</span>
<span class="n">parse</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'2017-3-7'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[52]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(2017, 3, 7, 0, 0)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [53]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">parse</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'4/5/17'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[53]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(2017, 4, 5, 0, 0)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [55]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">parse</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'June 6th, 1984, 10:45 PM'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[55]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(1984, 6, 6, 22, 45)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>When you know you're dealing with International date formats that list the day before the month, <code>parse()</code> takes an argument <code>dayfirst=True</code></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [60]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">parse</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'4-5-17'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">dayfirst</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span> <span class="p">)</span>  <span class="c1"># May 4th</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[60]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>datetime.datetime(2017, 5, 4, 0, 0)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>However, <code>parse()</code> is not built to handle arrays of dates.  You'd have to use list comprehension to work with arrays.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [62]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">parse</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">x</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'7-21-17'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'7-22-17'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'7-23-17'</span><span class="p">]]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[62]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>[datetime.datetime(2017, 7, 21, 0, 0),
 datetime.datetime(2017, 7, 22, 0, 0),
 datetime.datetime(2017, 7, 23, 0, 0)]</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Pandas-.to_datetime()">Pandas <code>.to_datetime()</code><a class="anchor-link" href="#Pandas-.to_datetime()">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><code>pd.to_datetime()</code> <strong>is</strong> built to handle arrays of dates and parses as well as <code>parse()</code></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [75]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="n">datestrs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'7/6/2017'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'8-9-17'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'12-Feb-17'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">datestrs</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[75]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>DatetimeIndex(['2017-07-06', '2017-08-09', '2017-02-12'], dtype='datetime64[ns]', freq=None)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>When <code>pd.to_datetime()</code> parses multiple date strings, the result is a Pandas DatetimeIndex.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [70]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'7/6/2017'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[70]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>Timestamp('2017-07-06 00:00:00')</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>But when <code>pd.to_datetime()</code> parses a single date string, the result is a Pandas Timestamp.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Time-Series-Basics">Time Series Basics<a class="anchor-link" href="#Time-Series-Basics">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The most basic kind of time series object in Pandas is, generically, a Series of data indexed by timestamps.<br />
The timestamps may arise from Python strings or <code>datetime</code> objects.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">Series</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">datetime</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">datetime</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [2]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">datetime</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">datetime</span>
<span class="n">dates</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2017</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2017</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2017</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2017</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2017</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2017</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">)]</span>
<span class="n">ts</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">randn</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dates</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="nb">type</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ts</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[3]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>pandas.core.series.Series</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Under the hood, these datetime objects have been assembled into a Pandas DatetimeIndex and the variable <code>ts</code> is of type <code>Series</code>.<br />
** older documentation may refer to a <code>TimeSeries</code> type but that was deprecated with Pandas 0.13</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>As with all Series, arithmetic operations between differently indexed time series automatically align on the dates:</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [4]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[4]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-02    1.013992
2017-01-05   -0.544905
2017-01-07   -1.324754
2017-01-08   -0.020392
2017-01-10    0.635246
2017-01-12    0.251412
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span><span class="p">[::</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>  <span class="c1"># every other</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[5]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-02    1.013992
2017-01-07   -1.324754
2017-01-10    0.635246
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">ts</span><span class="p">[::</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>  <span class="c1"># numbers summed where indexes match, NaNs where the 2nd Series has nothing</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[6]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-02    2.027985
2017-01-05         NaN
2017-01-07   -2.649507
2017-01-08         NaN
2017-01-10    1.270492
2017-01-12         NaN
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Scalar values from the DatetimeIndex are of Pandas type <code>Timestamp</code>.  A <code>Timestamp</code> can be substituted anywhere you'd use a <code>Datetime</code> object.<br />
Additionally, it can store frequency information and understands how to do Time Zone conversions and other kinds of manipulations.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [7]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[7]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>DatetimeIndex(['2017-01-02', '2017-01-05', '2017-01-07', '2017-01-08',
               '2017-01-10', '2017-01-12'],
              dtype='datetime64[ns]', freq=None)</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [8]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="nb">type</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ts</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[8]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>pandas._libs.tslib.Timestamp</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Indexing,-Selecting,-Subsetting">Indexing, Selecting, Subsetting<a class="anchor-link" href="#Indexing,-Selecting,-Subsetting">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [9]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span>  <span class="c1"># reminder</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[9]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-02    1.013992
2017-01-05   -0.544905
2017-01-07   -1.324754
2017-01-08   -0.020392
2017-01-10    0.635246
2017-01-12    0.251412
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [10]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[10]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>Timestamp('2017-01-07 00:00:00')</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [11]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">stamp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ts</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [12]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">stamp</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[12]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>-1.3247536905615083</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Can also pass a string that is interpretable as a date:</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [13]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Jan-7-2017'</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[13]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>-1.3247536905615083</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [14]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'20170107'</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[14]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>-1.3247536905615083</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>For longer time series, a year only or a year and month can be passed to select data:</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [15]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">longer_ts</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">randn</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1000</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">date_range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'1/1/2014'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">periods</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1000</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [16]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">longer_ts</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Slicing with dates works like slicing with a regular Series:</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [19]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">longer_ts</span><span class="p">[:</span><span class="s1">'2014-Feb-15'</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[19]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Because time series are usually ordered chronologically, you can slice using dates that aren't actually present in the index:</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [21]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span>  <span class="c1"># reminder</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[21]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-02    1.013992
2017-01-05   -0.544905
2017-01-07   -1.324754
2017-01-08   -0.020392
2017-01-10    0.635246
2017-01-12    0.251412
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [22]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'1/3/2017'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'1-11-17'</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[22]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-05   -0.544905
2017-01-07   -1.324754
2017-01-08   -0.020392
2017-01-10    0.635246
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Remember, slicing returns a view on the original, so modifying the slice modifies the original.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [44]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">sl</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ts</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'1/1/2017'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'1/6/2017'</span><span class="p">]</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [45]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">sl</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'1/2/2017'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">3.14159</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [46]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[46]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-02    3.141590
2017-01-05   -0.544905
2017-01-07   -1.324754
2017-01-08   -0.020392
2017-01-10    0.635246
2017-01-12    0.251412
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>but adding a new entry to the slice does not add to the original</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [47]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">sl</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2017</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">)]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">2.781828</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [48]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">sl</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[48]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-02    3.141590
2017-01-05   -0.544905
2017-01-06    2.781828
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [49]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[49]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-02    3.141590
2017-01-05   -0.544905
2017-01-07   -1.324754
2017-01-08   -0.020392
2017-01-10    0.635246
2017-01-12    0.251412
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Note when <strong>adding</strong> to a time series, whether slice or original, you must supply a proper Datetime subscript, not a string:</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [50]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">sl</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'1/3/2017'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">1.11111</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [51]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">sl</span>  <span class="c1"># not inserted chronologically in the DatetimeIndex</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[51]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-02 00:00:00    3.141590
2017-01-05 00:00:00   -0.544905
2017-01-06 00:00:00    2.781828
1/3/2017               1.111110
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>If you want, instead, to get a copy, not a view, use the awkwardly named <code>truncate()</code> method with no arguments.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [52]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ts</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">truncate</span><span class="p">()</span>  <span class="c1"># makes a copy, can use arguments to restrict data before or after dates</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [53]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts2</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[53]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-02    3.141590
2017-01-05   -0.544905
2017-01-07   -1.324754
2017-01-08   -0.020392
2017-01-10    0.635246
2017-01-12    0.251412
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [54]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts2</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'1/2/2017'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">4</span>  <span class="c1"># alter the copy</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [55]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts2</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[55]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-02    4.000000
2017-01-05   -0.544905
2017-01-07   -1.324754
2017-01-08   -0.020392
2017-01-10    0.635246
2017-01-12    0.251412
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [56]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">ts</span>  <span class="c1"># doesn't affect the original</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[56]:</div>
<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>2017-01-02    3.141590
2017-01-05   -0.544905
2017-01-07   -1.324754
2017-01-08   -0.020392
2017-01-10    0.635246
2017-01-12    0.251412
dtype: float64</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Slicing-time-series-in-DataFrames">Slicing time series in DataFrames<a class="anchor-link" href="#Slicing-time-series-in-DataFrames">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The above holds true for DataFrames as well.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [145]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">dates</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">date_range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'1/1/2014'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">periods</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">freq</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'W-WED'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">dates</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[145]:</div>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">long_df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">random</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">randn</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">columns</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'California'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Texas'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'New York'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Florida'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">dates</span><span class="p">)</span>
